name: OceanCraft
description:
OceanCraft is a game about surviving on a self build vehicle on the ocean.
Survive the dangers of the ocean - alone - or with your friends.

SURVIVAL
Hunt for food in the ocean or plant differnt vegetables on your base to ensure your survival.
But be careful, you are not the only one hunting out there!!

MULTIPLAYER
You dont have to survive on your own. Meet up with your friends in virtual reality and master this adventure together

CRAFTING
Build the many different decorative or functional objects to grow your base and make surviving on the ocean a little more comfortable.
